transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan madam bolo.
Customer: Haan ji Mayuri mam Shraddha baat kar rahi hu India Mart se.
Executive: Boliye.
Customer: Ji ji actually mam aapko number change karana tha na?
Customer: Haan haan haan to abhi aap connect ho sakte ho mere sath video meeting mein?
Customer: Video call karna padega?
Executive: Haan actually main guide kar dungi na to proper way mein ho jayega. Aap mujhe ye bataye system se use karte ho ki laptop se use karte ho?
Customer: System pe login karti hu madam lekin login nahi hai mobile se access karti hu.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Aur OTP to aapke hi phone mein aata hoga na?
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm. Aap mujhe ye bataye kis mail ID pe aapko video meeting ka link share karna hai mam?
Customer: Ha mail ID kyuki aapko mail ID bhi change karani hai na? Ha is pe.
Customer: Kaunsa MD?
Executive: Haan MD hai na waha par MD karo madam.
Customer: MD impact?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: 09@gmail.com
Executive: 09
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: @gmail.com
Customer: Haan correct.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Check kariye mam mail aaya hoga Shraddha ke naam se.
Customer: Ek hi minute rukiye.
Customer: Chalu rakho madam.
Executive: Thik hai.

Executive: Primary secondary dono number aapke hai na mam?
Customer: Ek minute aap kaunsa hai mere ko confirm karna.
Executive: Ek last mein 409 hai aur ek aur last mein 737 wala. Ye mere hai dono number.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Join with Google Meet se rukiye madam.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji join kariye.

Customer: Pehle login kar lu?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Pehle login kar lu?
Executive: Aap pehle join kar lijiye fir usme fir login kar lijiyega koi issue nahi hai.
Customer: Kar liya.
Customer: Join nahi ho raha madam.
Executive: Aapna call hold var thevnyat aala ahe, krupaya line var raha. Aap thode velani call kara. Hatachi mahiti milvnyasathi recharge. Aani aaplyasathi bharpur offer milvnyasathi V app login kara. Aapka call hold par rakha gaya hai.
Executive: Ye kaam kariye waha pe dekhiye screen share ka option aa raha hoga aapko.
Executive: Hatachi jankari.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to change her phone number.

- Customer wants to change her email ID.

- Customer is unable to join Google Meet.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to guide via video meeting.

- Executive asked for the email ID to share link.

- Executive confirmed primary and secondary numbers.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Executive asked customer to join Google Meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- number change, email id, google meet
